question: So for a while from when I was about 5-6 months till now I'm 36 weeks and..4days.But my doctor told me I am carrying too much water theres too much amniotic fluid.  First it was 25 point something and now it went down to 22 as of......Friday. I was already checked for abnormalitys that they take ur blood when ur like 18 or so weeks and I was fine and I was fine for the diabetes thing. So I'm still worriesd about this whole thing. I have no idea what to expect I want my baby to be ok.Has this ever happened to anyone?
title: has anyone else experienced this?
